title: Cats and Dogs Welcome! We are Pet Friendly! 2 BD / 2 BA
posting_body: ['Essex Apartments', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1791 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $3565 - $4516', '(844) 800-3206', 'Community Description', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO
